timeline.bodyText:
How do we know when data distribution has to completed if we add new nodes?
Since we know from the event what the target is, wouldn't it be better to identify the nodes that we are scaling to (i.e. the count nodes that are active, not retired and have the same resources as the cluster.targetResources()), then for each of those check with cluster controller if the node is in sync?
timeline.author: freva

replies.bodyText: Yes, you are right; in that case we need to talk to the cluster controller. Not everything else is in place for content clusters yet either: They don't send the generation metric, and some times apply the new generation too quickly.
replies.author: bratseth
